name: Candy Master Mania: Party Candy
description:
Candy Master Mania is a simple and colorful puzzle for those who enjoy matching games and simple puzzle adventures.
Swap Cakes to create matches and try to obtain a high score within the given moves, keeping in mind that some of the matches will provoke thrilling chain reactions which will make the game even more fun.
A well-designed and complete puzzle game with no originality but lots of fun.

---- Exciting Features ----

● Match 3 cute and adorable sweet Cakes to complete level targets!
● Match as much as you can before you run out of moves!
● Easy to learn, a lifetime to master!
● Compete for highest score against your friends on Facebook!
● 200+ well designed levels and WORLDY themes perfectly mix the simplicity and challenges for endless FUN!
● Unlock different powerful items and boosters to help you get a HIGH SCORE!
